required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Is There a Role of Phosphodiesterase 5 Inhibitor (Sildenafil) in Relieving Ureteral Stent Related Symptoms, RCT
clinical_study.official_title: Is There a Role of Phosphodiesterase 5 Inhibitor (Sildenafil) in Relieving Ureteral Stent Related Symptoms: A Randomized Controlled Trial

brief_summary.textblock:
Despite its beneficial effect, ureteral stents may produce lower urinary tract symptoms (such as dysuria, frequency, urgency, urge incontinence and suprapubic pain) that affect the quality of life and sexual health in 70-80%.
This study will be conducted to evalute the role of Phosphodiestrase 5 inhibitor (Sildenafil) in relieving these symptoms.

detailed_description.textblock:
Patient: Patient who will undergo ureteral stent fixation after endoscopic procedures
Inclusion criteria:
1. Patient aged from 20-50 years.
2. Sexually active. .Exclusion criteria:
1. Patients who had LUTS before stent fixation. 2. Ureteral stent fixation after open surgery.

primary_outcome.measure: the ureteral stent symptoms questionnaire total score
primary_outcome.description: show the difference of the total score and every section score in patient received Sildenafil and placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Is it safe to patient with ureteral stent to received Sildenafil
secondary_outcome.description: analyse the side effect of the drug on patient and if they get benefit or not.this analysis based on VAS and The IIEF-5 Questionnaire (SHIM)

arm_group.description: Patient in this arm will recieve sildinafil 50 mg tablet once daily after ureteral stent fixation for 2 weeks .
Patient in this arm will recieve Placebo daily after ureteral stent fixation for 2 weeks .

intervention.description: Patients in this arm will receive Sildenafil 50 tablet daily from fixation of the stent for 2 weeks

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Patient aged from 20-50 years
2. Sexually active
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Patients who had LUTS before DJ stent fixation
2. DJ stent fixation after open surgery

overall_official.affiliation: Urology and Nephrology Center, Mansoura University, Egypt

facility.name: Urology and Nephrology Center, Mansoura University
